trans-unit.source: Collects the characteristics associated with flow layouts.
trans-unit.target: Coleta as características associadas a layouts de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class collects and manages the characteristics associated with the flow layout scheme.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> classe coleta e gerencia as características associadas o esquema de layout de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: This class is used internally by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> classes, as well as the flow layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada internamente pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> classes, bem como o mecanismo de layout de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class is used by the layout engine to determine how to layout the container's child controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> classe é usada pelo mecanismo de layout para determinar como ao layout com do contêiner controles filho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class manages the following information:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> classe gerencia as seguintes informações:

trans-unit.source: The flow direction of consecutive controls.
trans-unit.target: A direção do fluxo de controles consecutivos.

trans-unit.source: Whether the contents should be wrapped or clipped if the child controls cannot be contained within their parent.
trans-unit.target: Se o conteúdo deve ser quebrado ou cortado se os controles filho não podem ser contidos em seu pai.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> does not have a public constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> não tem um construtor público.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the flow direction of consecutive controls.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a direção do fluxo de controles consecutivos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection" /> indicating the flow direction of consecutive controls in the container.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection" /> indicando a direção do fluxo de controles consecutivas no contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection.LeftToRight" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.FlowDirection.LeftToRight" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings.FlowDirection%2A> is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings.FlowDirection%2A> é a propriedade padrão para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> classe.

trans-unit.source: The child control.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the flow break setting of the control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que representa a configuração de interrupção do fluxo do controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the flow break is set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a interrupção do fluxo for definida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current flow layout engine.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o mecanismo de layout do fluxo atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> currently being used.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine" /> está sendo usado atualmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A> property is typically used in two contexts:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A> propriedade normalmente é usada em dois contextos:

trans-unit.source: A container that uses a flow layout.
trans-unit.target: Um contêiner que usa um layout de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: A control contained within a flow layout container (for example, a button contained in a cell of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>).
trans-unit.target: Um controle contido em um contêiner de layout de fluxo (por exemplo, um botão contido em uma célula de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>).

trans-unit.source: The child control.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho.

trans-unit.source: The flow break value to set.
trans-unit.target: O valor de interrupção de fluxo a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that represents the flow break setting of the control.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor que representa a configuração de interrupção do fluxo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents should be wrapped or clipped when they exceed the original boundaries of their container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o conteúdo deve ser encapsulado ou cortado quando ele excede os limites originais do respectivo contêiner.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the contents should be wrapped; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if the contents should be clipped.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o conteúdo deve ser encapsulado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" /> se o conteúdo deve ser recortado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: If the area of the container is too small to display all the child controls, then at least one control will be clipped regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings.WrapContents%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Se a área do contêiner é muito pequena para exibir todos os controles filho, pelo menos um controle será recortado independentemente do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings.WrapContents%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent resizing of the container will reapply the layout to the contained controls.
trans-unit.target: Redimensionando subsequentes do contêiner para reaplicar o layout em controles contidos.
